text: Jean-Claude Richard (born 31 January 1946 is a retired French-Swiss football defender and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Racing Besançon players Category:FC La Chaux-de-Fonds players Category:Neuchâtel Xamax FCS players Category:FC Sion players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss football managers Category:FC Sion managers
title: Jean-Claude Richard (footballer)
